resources.string:
"Warning: Leaving the LED on for a long time might overheat it.
Full brightness 'always on' has been tested running for ½ hr, but there is the risk this could damage the LED. "
"Original code from Nexus One Torch by Ben Buxton, released under the GPLv3, modified for CyanogenMod. http://n1torch.googlecode.com"

"Full brightness has been tested successfully for ½ hour of operation, but got quite hot, and started flickering (temporarily) at 45 mins. Long term effects are unknown.
Click 'Accept' if you want to use it at your own risk."
